subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The Tour de France winner Alberto Contador, whose Astana team has been barred from entering this year’s race, said he would not change teams to defend his title. The Tour’s organizer, Amaury Sport Organization, said Astana could not take part in this year’s race because it had been implicated in doping scandals.
